type="standard"/></views><searchfields/></skootable></components><resources><labels/><javascript><jsitem location="external" name="ApexAjax" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ExperianBusinessCredit" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CRD_Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','runBusinessCreditCheck',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ExperianConsumerCredit" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CRD_Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','requestConsumerCreditCheck',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CANScoring" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CRD_Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','runCANScoring',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ProcessOcrolusBankStatement" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CRD_Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','runOcrolusBankStatementProcess',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
    window.location.reload();
} catch(err) {
    var noBanksErrorMessage = 'There was no Bank Statement found for this application';
    if(err.faultstring.includes(noBanksErrorMessage)) {
        alert(noBanksErrorMessage);
    } else {
        alert(err);
    }
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="LexisNexisCheck" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CRD_Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','runLexisNexisCheck',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="GetOcrolusDocsStatus" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CRD_Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','runOcrolusDocumentGetStatus',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
    
    alert(ret);

    var creditReportPageInclude = skuid.$('#sk-3ubp-469').data('object');
    if(creditReportPageInclude) {
        creditReportPageInclude.unrender();
        creditReportPageInclude.load();
    }
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="inline" name="borderclass" cachelocation="false">.iframeborder{ border : solid; }
</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="tab" cachelocation="false">.tabs{ color:black; }
</cssitem></css><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2HSn-345"><actionsequence id="efbe5520-8fe5-47f2-a4bd-fda96ba8e2f3" label="MovingSequency" uniqueid="sk-2w6n-393"><actions><action type="blockUI" message="Moving..." timeout="4000"/><action type="redirect" snippet="moveFile" window="self" url="javascript:skuid.snippet.getSnippet('moveFile')('{{Name}}','{{clcommon__Attachment_Id__c}}','{{SelectCategory}}');"/><action type="save"/></actions><description/></actionsequence></actionsequences></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles><interactions/></skuidpage>
